General_Description: '''Hobby Horsing''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Riddle: ''What tragic times! Our farm once raised the fastest [[horse]]s. Go to the [[Arrachion Camp|race course]] in the [[Forest of Soron]]. There you'll find me on a table with small toy horses, the last remaining memories of a great team.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra found and recovered the engraving.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
